snippet.title: The 3rd Night | Full Game Playthrough | No Commentary Indie Horror Gameplay
snippet.description:
Check out the game here: https://asteristic.itch.io/the-3rd-night

Asteristic Game Studio: "The 3rd Night was a short 3D experiment made in Construct 2 (using the Q3D plugin). We decided to give it a shot and made this in around 15 days, just in time for the Haunted PS1's Horrifying Halloween game jam."

♥ Leave a Like and subscribe if you enjoyed the video, it will help the channel grow.  Also don't hesitate to leave a comment, I love hearing from you guys, positive or negative is all good ♥
___________________________________________________________________________________
►Check out my website for more games and full guides - https://www.roofbeer.tv
►SUBSCRIBE - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCzJiPC-RwgwZRzZHro5VtQ?sub_confirmation=1&via=tb
►Follow me on Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/roofbeertv

P.S. I'm a sucker for indie horror games so if that's your jam I make 1 new indie horror game video every single day.

►Subscribe to Roofbeer to get all the new gameplay videos and walkthroughs of the latest horror games!

The 3rd Night Walkthrough includes the full The 3rd Night Gameplay on PC. This The 3rd Night Playthrough is recorded in 1080p 60FPS on PC and includes the full game and ending.

No Commentary Gameplays, Let's Plays, Playthroughs, Walkthroughs of Indie Games, AAA Games, Horror Games.
